reviews.review: Should have an language option, so u can play with English only!

CSGO games are perfect for those who like shooting games.Cheaters are plentiful in CSGO matchmaking ranging from wallhacks to spinbots and also lots of cheaters disguised as legit players.if you have reached black rank then cheaters will increase even you will meet spinbots.I suggest you to play on faceit if you want to do it.Ty guys.Ty Valve...enjoy the game
